reviews.text: Old hotel in an amazing location! The breakfast is superb. There are many attractions nearby. Staff was very friendly and gave us good directions to laundry and grocery stores. I only wish the rooms were cooler at night. Also the shower is a bit small.

Overall great experience at Blauer Bock. Rooms were a bit small but clean and well kept. Good view of the street. Good breakfast and nice staff. Also great location. I will say this place is rather expensive for the size of the rooms. But decent stay.
This is wonderful hotel to stay at, very cozy and authentic. Great location and the breakfast buffet has a very healthy assortment of dishes to choose from. I recommend highly.

We paid 383€ per night, rooms are extremely basic, no fridge, no extra pillows and we ran out of soap and was never refilled. The included breakfast was extremely basic and they told us it was worth “30€ per person” but it was far from it. Trays almost always empty even at an early hour.
For the price we expected a more top experience, but it’s like an ibis at most. Great location and very clean.

We stayed in the economy room during an overnight layover to explore munich.

The economy room was very nice, actually bigger than I had expected. Great lighting, big windows, comfy bed, and ample storage.

The separated bathrooms are single bathrooms, not dorm style, which is great.

As all others have said, breakfast is great.
